name: Comlink (V)
Lore: 'Hand-held communication device. Military comlinks have scrambling and variable frequency programming for secure communication during battles or emergencies.',
Text: 'Deploy on an Imperial warrior.  Your characters may deploy as a ''react'' to same or adjacent site.  If at an opponent''s site, when opponent is losing Force from Force drains here, lost Force must come from Life Force (if possible).',
